name: safe-kids
description: Safe kis is a system dedicated to the efficient management of the student withdrawal process in educational institutions. It facilitates the administration of requests, status tracking, and report generation, ensuring precise and organized handling of information.

scripts.rename-env-file: cd server && copy .env.example .env && php artisan key:generate
scripts.build: cd client && pnpm build && cd ../server && composer install --optimize-autoloader --no-dev
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd client && pnpm install && cd ../server && composer install && cd .. && pnpm rename-env-file
